title: Learning to Unlearn: Instance-wise Unlearning for Pre-trained Classifiers. (arXiv:2301.11578v2 [cs.LG] UPDATED)
abstract: Since the recent advent of regulations for data protection (e.g., the General Data Protection Regulation), there has been increasing demand in deleting information learned from sensitive data in pre-trained models without retraining from scratch. tldr: 本文提出了一种实例级别的遗忘方法，以删除预训练模型中一组实例的信息，并通过利用对抗样本和重要性度量减少残留数据的遗忘。
